FROM: ARYACORP PVT. LTD.
DATE & TIME: 21-08-2024 12:29:21   (GMT +5:30)
REFERΕNCE NO: 17722618 


ATTN CHARTERING DESK
DEAR SIR
GOOD DAY
DIRECT OWNERS VESSEL
PLEASE ADVISE SUITABLE CARGO FOR BELOW VESSEL

MV  CP SHENZHEN  - SMX/UMX - OPEN BIN QASIM - 3-10 SEP
- BOD 930/110MT
-2*25/DIRTY OK, NO PASSING GOA/ON DECK

MV “CP Shenzhen”
Year Built    : 2017
FULL LOAD DISPLACEMNT: 75196 .6 MT
DWT: 63539.7 MT
TPC on SSW: 62.3MT/CM
Grain / bale: total abt. 78771.05 / abt. 73680 all in CBM
Deck Crane SWL 30T in hook only x 4 sets 
Remote Control Grab SWL 15T (12 cbm) x 4 sets

SPEED & CONSUMPTION:

About 13.5 knots on about 29.5 mts IFO LADEN 
About 14.5 knots on about 27.5 mts IFO BALLAST

Eco Speed wog
About 11.7 knots on about 22.3 mts IFO LADEN
About 12.6 knots on about 22.3 mts IFO BALLAST

While ballasting or deballasting operation, additional 1.5 mts IFO per day.

Consumption in port:
Idle: about 2.0 mts IFO (1set G/E) + 1.2 mts IFO for boiler in summer or 1.5 mts for boiler in winter
With cranes working: about 4.0 mts IFO (2set G/E) + 1.2 mt IFO for boiler in summer or 1.5 mts for boiler in winter

ADA

PLSD TO HEAR.
 
BEST REGARDS,
